body: An eidolon is obviously of unnatural origin. Normal animals do not willingly approach the eidolon unless the animal's master makes a DC 25 Handle Animal, Ride, or wild empathy check.
name: Unnatural Aura
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Summoner/Evolutions/1-Point Evolutions/Unnatural Aura
